title: Ticket #2707: better support for different input and output directory for file xfer
description:
Igor came across a situation where it was desired to transfer back the job output to HDFS, because there was not enough local disk space. To accomplish this, he set initialdir to a directory in HDFS. He then had to convert all of the input file references to absolute paths.

It would have been nice to have independent control over the default base path for input and output files.
creator: danb
